author: Melissa Eddy and Alison Smale
title: Berlin Crash Is Suspected to Be a Terror Attack, Police Say
description: Police said the truck jumped the sidewalk and drove into crowds at a holiday market, killing 12 and injuring dozens. The suspected driver was arrested.

author: Tim Arango and Rick Gladstone
title: Russian Ambassador to Turkey Is Assassinated in Ankara
description: The shooting at an art exhibit, said to be carried out by a 22-year-old police officer, forced Turkey and Russia to confront a new crisis tied directly to the Syrian conflict.

author: Paul Krugman
title: How Republics End
description: No, our institutions won’t save us.

author: Melissa Eddy and Alison Smale
title: Berlin Crash Is Suspected to Be a Terror Attack, Police Say
description: Police said the truck jumped the sidewalk and drove into crowds at a holiday market, killing 12 and injuring dozens. The suspected driver was arrested.

author: Landon Thomas Jr., Liz Alderman and Aurelien Breeden
title: I.M.F. Stands by Christine Lagarde, Convicted of Negligence
description: With the International Monetary Fund facing populist criticism and at a critical juncture, Ms. Lagarde was found guilty of charges linked to her time as France’s finance minister.

author: Paul Krugman
title: How Republics End
description: No, our institutions won’t save us.

author: The New York Times
title: Donald Trump Completes Final Lap, Electoral College, to White House
description: Electors across the country met on Monday and officially gave Mr. Trump a majority of votes, ending a long-shot bid to block his victory.

author: Nate Cohn
title: Why Trump Had an Edge in the Electoral College
description: It wasn’t about small-state bias or regionalism. It was about the nature of the battleground states, and there was one other key element: luck.

author: Robert D. McFadden
title: Zsa Zsa Gabor, Actress Famous for Her Glamour (and Her Marriages), Dies at 99
description: Ms. Gabor put a luster on American celebrity with her self-parodying glamour and revolving-door millionaire marriages. She was 99.

author: Emmarie Huetteman
title: The Electoral College Meets Monday. Here’s What to Expect.
description: The nation’s electors will convene across the country to cast ballots for the president and vice president.

author: Paul Krugman
title: How Republics End
description: No, our institutions won’t save us.
